index.html.title: Welcome
index.html.blurb: Welcome! This is my open research notebook. While you can follow my GitBook writing, this is a place where I make my research related to the project available to you. Soundscapes for Empathy and Affect.html.author: Rob Blades
Soundscapes for Empathy and Affect.html.title: Soundscapes for Empathy and Affect
Soundscapes for Empathy and Affect.html.blurb: Phenomenology is the best approach in my view because it looks at sound through experience. This is limited of course because it is *only* human experience. It is also a view of the world created by western philosophy, not used by the best people (i.e. Heidegger was a Nazi). Phenomenology,...

Ottawa City Woodshop Recording.html.blurb: What I heard had good value. Loud or even distressing noises were good to my ears because it meant success. To others, it may hurt their ears, annoy them, stress them, bring about bad memories. How to make subjectivity of sounds problematic by implicit in map? First, read my audience:...
